title: New champion is Rengar's Crazy Uncle!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/uBxhx5I.png

I can see the family resemblance!

replies.body: Maybe Rengar is just a freakishly oversized Yordle?

I'll never have to visit these boards again, nothing will be better than this post.

Plot twist:

Kled is the hunter that raised Rengar.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=upy7rIh8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-21T19:17:39.697+0000)
>
> Plot twist:
> 
> Kled is the hunter that raised Rengar.

i hope that is true
He was raised by humans.
They haven't updated everyones lore yet, so it is still possible that he could get a lore change.

They ret-conned the lore that was heavily based on the Summoners and the Institute of War.
Rengar is simply a humanoid beast that was raised by humans and truly loves hunting.
I don't see why they should change his lore.
Yeah, but weren't they updating the champs lore by area (shurima event) etc.

Humans... and a single yordle.

Boom. Done.

rengar and gnar, wild noises in bush, cops called, gone sexual,
It's a combination of Rengar, Gnar, and maybe gangplank?

There has been a desire for a yordle jungler and I think a yordle has been confirmed for release. So I'm assuming it's a yordle jungler who has a fascination with Rengar, probably with a skin with homage to another jungle or Champion
You guys got it all wrong, Kled is Rengar's son. ;--)
